block.p: PRICEMAN--Beulah. On May 20, 2005. Loving wife of the late Louis. Devoted mother of Melody Alstodt (Harvey), Barnett (Marsha), Nadine Belkin and Jason Tare (Joyce). Beloved sister of Leonard Katz; adoring grandmother of Lance (Romina), Lara (Michael), Spencer (Lindsay), Casey, Alec, Madison and future great grandmother. Services 1PM Sunday at the South Baldwin Jewish Center, 2959 Grand Ave, Baldwin, N.Y. Interment New Montefiore Cemetery. For information please contact I.J. Morris, Inc., Hemp stead, NY. 516-486-2500.
